hero.badge: From idea to clients in 90 days
hero.subtitle: We help small businesses go digital with fast, Google-ranked websites designed to sell. Direct contact, honest pricing, and real technology.

card1.title: Without a Professional Website, Google Doesn't Know You Exist
card1.desc: 89% of consumers search online before buying. If your business doesn't appear in the top Google results, for your potential customers, you simply don't exist.

card2.title: Bad Web Design Drives Customers Away
card2.desc: You have less than 3 seconds to make a good impression. A website that loads slowly, doesn't work on mobile, or looks abandoned makes the customer leave before reading anything.

card3.title: Appear on Google Without Paying for Ads
card3.desc: Appearing when someone searches for your service in your city doesn't require ads. With a well-optimized website, customers find you on their own â€” and that traffic never stops.

services.tag: What We Can Do for You
services.title2: Small Businesses That Want to Grow
services.subtitle: No technical jargon, no fine print. We help you build a real digital presence that attracts customers and grows your business â€” anywhere in Spain.

s1.title: Professional Website
s1.desc: Your business on the internet with a modern, fast, and mobile-friendly design. Looking good, loading fast, and converting visitors into customers from day one.

s2.title: SEO and Google Ranking
s2.desc: Show up when your customers search for you. We optimize your website so Google shows you before your competition, without paying for advertising.

s3.title: Online Store and E-commerce
s3.desc: Sell your products 24/7. Complete stores with a shopping cart, secure payment, and easy management â€” no technical knowledge required.

s4.title: Existing Website Redesign
s4.desc: Is your website outdated or not working well? We modernize, accelerate, and optimize it so it stops driving customers away and starts attracting them.

s5.title: Custom Apps and Tools
s5.desc: Online bookings, CRM, order management, digital catalogs â€” if you have a manual process that takes up your time, we automate it for your business.

s6.title: No-Obligation Digital Consultancy
s6.desc: You don't know where to start or what you really need. We help you understand it without pressure. The first consultation is always free.

diff.title: Engineers Who Work Directly on Your Project
diff.subtitle: No agencies, no intermediaries, no sales reps. You speak with the person developing your website from the first day to the last.

d1.title: Experience in Real Tech Companies
d1.desc: We have led development teams in tech companies. We apply those same practices and standards to your project, regardless of its size.

d2.title: Modern Technology, Fast and Scalable Web
d2.desc: We use React, Next.js, and Node.js â€” the same technology used by Google or Netflix. Your website will load in less than 1 second and be ready to grow with you.

d3.title: Direct Contact, Honest Pricing
d3.desc: No inflated budgets or fine print. We explain exactly what you will receive, how much it will cost, and when it will be ready â€” before you sign anything.

d4.title: We Know the Spanish Market
d4.desc: Spanish payment gateways, adapted invoicing, local SEO in Spain, and availability for in-person or video meetings throughout the peninsula.

process.title2: to Your Live Website in 30 Days

s1.title: Free Consultation
s1.desc: We start by listening to you. We analyze your business, your competition, and what you really need â€” no jargon and no obligation. You decide if we move forward.

s2.title: Clear Proposal with No Fine Print
s2.desc: You receive a detailed quote with exactly what is included, the cost, and the delivery date. No surprises, no hidden costs.

s3.title: Development with Weekly Updates
s3.desc: We work on your project and keep you informed at all times. You will see real progress every week and can give us feedback before it's too late.

s4.title: Review and Adjustments with You
s4.desc: Before publishing anything, we review every detail together. Speed, design, text, forms â€” everything must be perfect and you must be 100% satisfied.

s5.title: Launch and Ongoing Support
s5.desc: We publish your website and don't disappear. We train you to manage it, resolve doubts, and remain available for any future improvements.

c1.title: WeClean
c1.desc: We created their website from scratch 10 months ago. In less than a year, it has already accumulated over 7,000 impressions on Google and appears in key searches like 'cleaning company in Torrevieja' and 'keyholding service Guardamar' â€” with SEO still in the growth phase.

c2.title: TaxiTime Torrevieja
c2.desc: Website developed 2 years ago for a local taxi company. Today it generates more than 415,000 annual impressions on Google with an average position of 4 and a CTR of 2.2% â€” dominating searches like 'taxi Torrevieja' with over 152,000 impressions for that keyword alone.

c3.title: Sanaja Beauty
c3.desc: Website designed 2 years ago for a beauty and massage center in Alicante. In the last 12 months, it has generated 32,000 impressions with a 5.3% CTR â€” well above the industry average â€” and an average position of 6 on Google.

tech.subtitle: React, Next.js, and Node.js â€” the same stack used by Google, Netflix, and Airbnb, adapted to your business size and budget.

cta.subtitle: First consultation free and without obligation. We tell you exactly what you need, how much it costs, and when you'll have it â€” before you sign anything.

consent.title: ðŸª Cookie Usage
consent.description: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience and analyze our website traffic. By accepting, you help us improve our services.

section1.title: 1. What are cookies?
section1.text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device (computer, tablet, or mobile) when you visit a website. Cookies are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and to provide information to site owners.

section2.title: 2. What cookies do we use?
section2.text: At NeuralForge, we use the following types of cookies:
items: Essential cookies: Necessary for the basic operation of the website. They include session cookies and language preference cookies.
Performance cookies: They allow us to analyze how visitors use our website to improve its performance. They collect information anonymously.
Functionality cookies: They allow us to remember the choices you make (such as your preferred language) to provide a more personalized experience.
Marketing cookies: Used to track visitors across websites with the intention of displaying relevant and engaging ads for the individual user.

section3.title: 3. Third-party cookies
section3.text: Some of our partners and service providers may set cookies on your device when you visit our website. These third parties include web analytics services and external content providers. We have no control over the cookies these third parties set. We recommend consulting the privacy policies of these third parties for more information.

section4.title: 4. How to control cookies?
section4.text: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies already on your device and configure most browsers to not accept them. However, if you do so, you may have to manually adjust some preferences each time you visit a site, and some services and functionalities may not work correctly.

section5.title: 5. Browser settings
section5.text: Most web browsers allow some control over cookies through the browser settings. To learn more about cookies, including how to see what cookies have been set and how to manage and delete them, visit your browser settings.
items: Google Chrome: Settings > Privacy and security > Cookies
Mozilla Firefox: Options > Privacy and security
Microsoft Edge: Settings > Privacy, search, and services

section6.title: 6. Changes to this policy
section6.text: We may update this cookie policy periodically to reflect changes in the cookies we use or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We recommend you check this page regularly to stay informed about our use of cookies.

section7.title: 7. Contact
section7.text: If you have questions about our cookie policy, you can contact us at hello@neuralforge.io or through our contact page.
